member.name: T:NuveiClient.Request
member.summary: Base Request Class holding common functionality for Request Types.

member.name: M:NuveiClient.Request.SetRequestTimeout(System.Int32)
member.param: Timeout in seconds. Defaults to 120 seconds in .NET.

member.name: T:NuveiClient.Response
member.summary: Base Response Class holding common functionality for Generating response Hash.

member.name: T:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest
member.summary:
Used for processing XML Auth Authorisations through the Nuvei TPS XML Gateway.
Basic request is configured on initialisation and optional fields can be configured.

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the auth request less optional parameters for processing an XML Transaction through the Nuvei XML Gateway
member.param: Terminal ID provided by Nuvei TPS
A unique merchant identifier. Alpha numeric and max size 12 chars.
ISO 4217 3 Digit Currency Code, e.g. EUR / USD / GBP
Transaction Amount, Double formatted to 2 decimal places.

Card Type (Accepted Card Types must be configured in the Merchant Selfcare System.)
Accepted Values :
VISA MASTERCARD LASER SWITCH SOLO AMEX DINERS MAESTRO DELTA ELECTRON JCB

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetCardNumber(System.String)
member.param: A valid Card Number that passes the Luhn Check.

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetTrackData(System.String)
member.param: Track Data

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetDukptCardDetails(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: Encrypted Track
KSN
Format ID

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetApplePayload(System.String)
member.param: Apple Payload

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetAndroidPayload(System.String)
member.param: Android Payload

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetEmail(System.String)
member.param: Email

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetDescription(System.String)
member.param: Description of transaction

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetAutoReady(System.String)
member.param:
Auto Ready is an optional parameter and defines if the transaction should be settled automatically.
Accepted Values :
Y - Transaction will be settled in next batch N - Transaction will not be settled until user changes state in Merchant Selfcare Section

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetNonSecureCardCardInfo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Setter for Card Expiry and Card Holder Name values. These are mandatory for non-SecureCard transactions
member.param: Numeric field with a max of 4 characters.
String field with a max of 50 characters.

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetCvv(System.String)
member.param: Numeric field with a max of 4 characters.

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetIssueNo(System.String)
member.param: Numeric field with a max of 3 characters.

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetAvs(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: First Line of address - Max size 50
Second Line of address - Max size 50
Postcode - Max size 50

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetForeignCurrencyInformation(System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.param: ISO 4217 3 Digit Currency Code, e.g. EUR / USD / GBP
(Amount X Conversion rate) Formatted to two decimal places
Converstion rate supplied in rate response

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetAvsOnly(System.String)
member.param:
Only perform an AVS check, do not store as a transaction.
Accepted Values :
Y - Transaction will be settled in next batch N - Transaction will not be settled until user changes state in Merchant Selfcare Section

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetMpiRef(System.String)
member.param: String holding MPI reference

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetMobileNumber(System.String)
member.param: Mobile Number of cardholder. If sent an SMS receipt will be sent to them

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetDeviceId(System.String)
member.param: Device ID to identify this source to the XML gateway

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetPhone(System.String)
member.param: Phone number of cardholder for verification only

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetCountry(System.String)
member.param: Cardholders Country

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetMotoTrans
member.summary: Setter to flag transaction as Mail Order. If not used the transaction defaults to eCommerce

member.param: BillToFirstName

member.param: City

member.param: region

member.param: ipAddress

member.param: signature

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.SetRecurringTxnRef(System.String)
member.param: Recurring Transaction Ref

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlAuthRequest.ProcessRequest(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method to process transaction and return parsed response from the Nuvei TPS XML Gateway
member.param: Shared secret either supplied by Nuvei TPS or configured under Terminal Settings in the Merchant Selfcare System.
Boolean value defining Mode true - This is a test account false - Production mode, all transactions will be processed by Issuer.
member.returns: XmlAuthResponse containing an error or the parsed payment response.

member.name: T:NuveiClient.XmlAuthResponse
member.summary:
Holder class for parsed response. If there was an error there will be an error string otherwise all values will be populated with the parsed payment response values.
IsError should be checked before accessing any fields.
ErrorString will contain the error if one occurred.

member.name: T:NuveiClient.XmlRateRequest
member.summary:
Rate request to be performed if the terminal is eDCC activated.
isError will hold a true value if eDCC is not applicable to this transaction.

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlRateRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.param: Terminal ID Assigned by Nuvei TPS
The first 6 digits of the card number

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlRateRequest.SetBaseAmount(System.Double)
member.param: The base amount

member.summary: MD5 Hash using for authenticating transaction

member.name: M:NuveiClient.XmlSubscriptionRegRequest.SetNewStoredSubscriptionValues(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Setter for New Stored Subscription info. Use this if you would like to register the Subscription under a new Stored Subscription
member.param: The name of the Stored Subscription
The description of the Stored Subscription
DAILY/WEEKLY/FORTNIGHTLY/MONTHLY/QUARTERLY/YEARLY
How many of the above periods should the subscriptions run for by default
ISO 4217 3 Digit Currency Code, e.g. EUR / USD / GBP / etc.
Amount that will be billed repeatedly
Amount that will be authorised immediately as the setup fee
Subscription automation type. AUTOMATIC/AUTOMATIC (WITHOUT AMOUNTS)/MANUAL
What happens to the subscriptions under this stored subscription when the stored subscription us updated? UPDATE/CONTINUE
What happens to the subscriptions under this stored subscription when the stored subscription us deleted? DELETE/CONTINUE
